item.title: Downtown Madison E-Bike Guided Tour
item.description: Make the most of your visit with the help of a guide who’ll take you to see some of the best of Madison by bike. Whether you want to get the lay of the land when you arrive in town for the first time, or you’re a local looking to learn more about the history of your city, this informative tour has something for everyone.

item.title: Trolley Pub Public Tour
item.description:
Check out the best Madison has to offer on this two-hour pedal powered pub crawl. You'll stop by some of the hottest spots in Downtown Madison on our mobile bar on wheels. Tours are BYOB with our on-board cooler and you can play your own music.
The tour is the most fun way to experience the city and our trained guides help have a blast.

item.title: Madison Ghosts: Haunts, Spirits, and Poltergeists Walking Tour
item.description:
Ready to uncover Madison’s spookiest secrets? Join us for a thrilling and fun walking ghost tour through the city’s most haunted historic spots! Led by expert local guides—Madison’s official haunted history gurus—you’ll hear real, chilling tales of the city’s dark past and the spirits that still roam today.
Explore iconic sites and hidden gems on Madison’s #1 guided ghost tours and haunted pub crawls. Experience spine-tingling stories nightly, revealing centuries of wicked history and visits to haunted buildings and bars. Wander haunted streets after dark and discover local legends, from infamous witch trials to scandalous tragedies.
Learn why Madison is one of America’s most haunted cities as you stroll through its historic district. Tours cover about a mile of ghostly ground, showcasing authentic tales and deep connections to the eerie past. Get ready for a hair-raising adventure on this captivating journey through Madison’s haunted history!

image.alt: Madison Ghosts: Haunts, Spirits, and Poltergeists Walking Tour

item.title: Wisconsin's Madtown: A Madison Self-Guided Walking Tour
item.description:
Travel between two lake-side terraces and enjoy some of Wisconsin's best cultural sites along the way with this self-guided and self-paced walking tour!
• Visit some of Madison historically rich architectural gems such as the State Capitol, Der Rathskaller, Bascomb Hill, Memorial Union and much more • Hear from producer Frank Burge, an award-winning writer, essayist and midwestern local • Do it all in an hour or linger at stops along the way with complete control over when you start and finish • Get unlimited use before your booking date and after it • Use the virtual tour option at home
Once you’ve booked, you’ll receive a ticket with instructions and a unique code listed under “Before You Go”. Then simply install the VoiceMap app and enter your code.
The app displays directions to the starting point, and when you’re in the right place, just pop in your headphones and tap start. VoiceMap has automatic GPS playback, with turn-by-turn directions. It also works offline.

image.alt: Wisconsin's Madtown: A Madison Self-Guided Walking Tour

item.title: Flying Dress Photo Shoot in Madison WI
item.description:
You are cordially invited to the most memorable experience of your life…
You may not know this but, the most exciting thing that has happened to photography since well…photography, is happening right here in Madison!
It’s your turn to indulge in a once-in a-lifetime photoshoot creating images you will cherish forever. Slip on the dress and transform into someone you have never experienced before.
You are the Emotion…You are the Intrigue…You are the Moment

image.alt: Flying Dress Photo Shoot in Madison WI

item.title: Yellowstone For Kids Family Fun Tour w/PU in West Yellowstone
item.description: All New “Yellowstone For Kids” is a fun and exciting family friendly adventure into Yellowstone’s most amazing attractions.We have designed this full day and all-inclusive kid friendly tour to get those kids out and about.At CWA we want our younger generation to get out and explore nature and learning about the science behind The Greater Yellowstone Ecosystem.Your family will be taking short hikes to amazing attractions such as:The Yellowstone Grand Canyon,The Norris Geyser Basin,The Old Faithful Geyser Basin,The Fountain Paint Pots and The Grand Prismatic Spring Geyser Basin.These short hikes are filled with fun facts about our Yellowstone Wildlife and cool scientific facts about our Yellowstone”Super Volcano”.While you’re traveling around YNP the kids will enjoy cool activities books and looking for wildlife.We provide snacks,beverages as well as lunch!This tour departs from West Yellowstone with pick ups starting at 7:00AM

image.alt: Yellowstone For Kids Family Fun Tour w/PU in West Yellowstone

item.title: The Original Madison Ghost Walk - State Street
item.description: Connecting the Wisconsin State Capitol with the UW–Madison Campus, State Street has been Madison’s center of city life for 150+ years. That means secrets, scandals, and, yes, paranormal activity. On this tour, you’ll get to hear all the spookiest stories, from the era of pioneers to the haunting of the Orpheum Theater.

image.alt: The Original Madison Ghost Walk - State Street

item.title: Madison, Wisconsin Scavenger Hunt
item.description: Go beyond the generic city tour and make exploring Madison a fast-paced thrill with this self-guided scavenger hunt. Using just your smartphone—and communicating with your remote host—you’ll explore the city from the lakeside Memorial Union Terrace and beyond, finding hints, talking to locals, solving puzzles, heading both indoors and outdoors, and racking up points to see how you stack on the leaderboard.

item.title: Madison UW Campus Haunted Ghost Tour
item.description: Turn exploring the UW–Madison campus into a fun, spooky adventure with this haunted walking tour. Concentrating on Library Mall and Bascom Hill, you’ll follow along with your guide as you discover ghostly and ghastly tales of legends, spirits, and documented paranormal experiences—if you’re lucky, you might even have an otherworldly experience yourself.

image.alt: Madison UW Campus Haunted Ghost Tour

item.title: Madison to Dane County Regional Airport (MSN) - Departure Private Transfer
item.description: Leave behind the travel hassles and get to Dane County Regional Airport totally stress-free. With your own personal driver picking you up from your Madison location, you’ll get assisted with your bags and shown directly to your private vehicle. Before you know it, you’ll have arrived at MSN safely, comfortably, right on schedule, and in VIP style.

image.alt: Madison to Dane County Regional Airport (MSN) - Departure Private Transfer

item.title: Axe-Throwing in Madison
item.description: FlannelJax's is a premium Axe-Throwing center which guarantees a dedicated lumberjack throughout your entire time at the venue. We're Extreme. Social. Fun !

item.title: Self Guided Scavenger Hunt: Artistic and Musical Madison
item.description: Leave behind the group walking tours and explore Madison a wilder way—via photo scavenger hunt. Using just your smartphone, you and your crew will wander from the Wisconsin State Capitol and famous State Street to the University of Wisconsin–Madison, the lakefront Union Terrace, and beyond. Along the way, you’ll complete crazy photo challenges, collect clues and points, and experience Mad City’s musical side.

image.alt: Self Guided Scavenger Hunt: Artistic and Musical Madison

item.title: Dane County Airport (MSN) to Madison - Private Arrival Transfer
item.description:
Book your private Arrival transfer from Dane County Regional Airport (Truax Field) (MSN) to Madison.
Your driver will be waiting for you at a scheduled time and you will travel comfortably to your destination.
• Meeting with a Nameplate • We track your Flight • Door-to-door Service • No Hidden Charges • Clean cars & Professional drivers

image.alt: Dane County Airport (MSN) to Madison - Private Arrival Transfer

item.title: Madison City Scavenger Hunt Excursion by Operation City Quest
item.description: Go beyond a normal city sightseeing tour and embark on a fun scavenger hunt through Madison, Wisconsin. The app tells you to find certain objects around the city, but in order to find the objects, you need to complete challenges. Earn points for every object found and be put in the ranking against other teams across the nation.

image.alt: Madison City Scavenger Hunt Excursion by Operation City Quest

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Madison by Wacky Walks
item.description: Explore Madison with Wacky Walks royal scavenger hunt. In our app-based scavenger hunt, your group will participate in competitions to become the King or Queen of your group throughout the game. The active King or Queen will lead the other players to find items around the city and complete fun tasks. For every item you find and task you complete, you will receive points. The goal of Wacky Walks is to stay the King or Queen for the longest and gain as many points as you can. Take your time playing Wacky Walks, there is no time limit and you can play in any area of the city you would like. There will be a remote host that will be chatting with you during the game in case you need anything. Come be the King or Queen in Madison for the day!

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Madison by Wacky Walks

item.title: Madison to Dane County Regional Airport (MSN) - Round-Trip Private Transfer
item.description:
Book your Private Round-Trip Transfer from Dane County Regional Airport (MSN) to Madison hotel or address and return.

Your driver will be waiting for you at a scheduled time and you will travel comfortably to your destination.
• Meeting with a Nameplate • We track your Flight • Door-to-door Service • No Hidden Charges • Clean cars & Professional drivers

item.title: Participate in a Fun Scavenger Hunt in Madison by Crazy Dash
item.description: Skip the generic walking tours and turn exploring Madison into a fun, scavenger-hunt style adventure. Using just your smartphone, you and your crew will find clues, complete crazy challenges, and maybe even ask for a few hints from your remote guide to solve the most difficult puzzles. Playing at your pace and strategy, you’ll gain points—and see if you can top the leaderboard.

image.alt: Participate in a Fun Scavenger Hunt in Madison by Crazy Dash

item.title: Experience the season with a scavenger hunt in Madison with Holly Jolly Hunt
item.description: Celebrate the magic of the season this year with Holly Jolly Hunt. Holly Jolly Hunt is an app based scavenger hunt that you can play anywhere of your choosing. Explore the city and look for holiday related items, both traditional and not so traditional. Take a photo through the app to score points for your scavenger hunt team. Perform fun, holiday challenges that will bring laughter to your team. See your score on the leaderboard compared to other teams from all over. Holly Jolly Hunt is guaranteed to provide lasting holiday memories. Whether you play with friends, family, or even co-workers, Holly Jolly will put a smile on your face for the rest of the year!

image.alt: Experience the season with a scavenger hunt in Madison with Holly Jolly Hunt

item.title: Unique Scavenger Hunt Experience in Madison by 3Quest Challenge
item.description: Explore Madison with 3Quest Challenge! Our scavenger takes you around the city to find items and perform tasks for points. You'll use an app on your phone that will allow you to collect points! Check the rankings during and after you play to see your score and compare it to others. All our Scavenger hunts have a live remote host to help along the way. Come out and explore with us in Madison.

image.alt: Unique Scavenger Hunt Experience in Madison by 3Quest Challenge
